jd: From: Diksha Choudhary, Tek Inspirations diksha.choudhary@tekinspirations.com Reply to: diksha.choudhary@tekinspirations.com Hi, Hope you are doing well! Title:Business Analyst (Telecom)Visa: anyLocation: Lansing, MI - hybridDuration: 6+monthsMOI: skypeClient: State of Michigan Recruiters Note:- need local with DL / need LinkedIN Key Responsibilities:Analyze and extrapolate datasets from the Service Desk Support Team using algorithm toolsReport data analysis findings and present insights on workloads and projectsFacilitate discussions to improve team understanding of data-driven resultsEnsure clear and concise communication within a dynamic enterprise environment Top Skills & Experience Required:Bachelor’s DegreeStrong data mining and analysis skills, with familiarity in the CRISP-DM processExperience with PBI, R, IBM SPSS, Tableau (1-3 years)Microsoft Project and Excel expertise (3-5 years)Experience with Remedy/Helix (3-5 years)Knowledge of working in large enterprises and multiple network platforms/services (3-5 years)DevOps experience is a plus (2-3 years)
